```{r model testing, warning=False}

#make a plot to solve


Ajust=1000000000000
FirstQuintile=summary(LIMSFullDF$N1Error)[2]
ThirdQuintile=summary(LIMSFullDF$N1Error)[5]
ModelDF <- LIMSFullDF%>%
  filter(N1!=0)%>%
  mutate(N1Error=ifelse(FirstQuintile/Ajust>N1Error,FirstQuintile/Ajust,N1Error))%>%
  mutate(N1Error=ifelse(ThirdQuintile*Ajust<N1Error,ThirdQuintile*Ajust,N1Error))
```

```{r how R2 works}
#rob ML uw mce

#10>0
#r^2 is 
#when rss is 0 R2 is 1
#downweight things above the regressive line
#down weight things that dont fit mode
r2RSE <- function(x){
  #x$w=x$w*0+1
  #observed-fitted
  rss <- sum(x$weights * x$residuals^2)
  mss <- sum(x$weights * x$fitted^2)
  R2 <- mss/(rss + mss)
  #1-(rss/(rss+mss))
  #
  DF=length(x$weights)-1
  RSE <- sqrt(rss/(DF))
  return(list(R2=R2,RSE=RSE))
}

options(scipen = 50)

r2RSE(SDModel)
summary(SDModel)
```

```{r, width=15,height=15}
library(ggpubr)
library(limma)
PointSize=.01
#make plots of each different set of weights to compare
#each with a couple spans
#3 by 3
#span ~0,2/weeks,~1 by 1,1/se,1/se^2
#enp.target
HighSpan <- .2
MinWeight <- 0

MadModDF <- ModelDF%>%
  filter(Site=="Madison")%>%
  select(Date,N1,N1Error)%>%
  mutate(Date=as.numeric(Date))

BasedPlot <- MadModDF%>%
  ggplot()+
  aes(x=Date)+
  geom_point(aes(y=N1))+
  scale_y_log10()

LM11 <- loessFit(y=MadModDF$N1,x=MadModDF$Date,weights=rep(1,dim(MadModDF)[1]),span=HighSpan,min.weight=MinWeight)

MadModDF$pred <- LM11$fitted
G11 <- BasedPlot+
  geom_line(aes(y=pred),color="red",size=PointSize, data=MadModDF)+
  ggtitle("weights=1, method=weightedlowess")

LM12 <- loessFit(y=MadModDF$N1,x=MadModDF$Date,weights=1/MadModDF$N1Error,span=HighSpan,min.weight=MinWeight)
MadModDF$pred <- LM12$fitted
G12 <- BasedPlot+
  geom_line(aes(y=pred),color="red",size=PointSize, data=MadModDF)+
  ggtitle("weights=1/N1Error, method=weightedlowess")

LM13 <- loessFit(y=MadModDF$N1,x=MadModDF$Date,weights=1/(MadModDF$N1Error^2),span=HighSpan,min.weight=MinWeight,)
MadModDF$pred <- LM13$fitted
G13 <- BasedPlot+
  geom_line(aes(y=pred),color="red",size=PointSize, data=MadModDF)+
  ggtitle("weights=1/N1Error^2, method=weightedlowess")



LM21 <- loessFit(y=MadModDF$N1,x=MadModDF$Date,weights=rep(1,dim(MadModDF)[1]),span=HighSpan,min.weight=MinWeight,method="loess")
MadModDF$pred <- LM21$fitted
G21 <- BasedPlot+
  geom_line(aes(y=pred),color="red",size=PointSize, data=MadModDF)+
  ggtitle("weights=1, method=loess")

LM22 <- loessFit(y=MadModDF$N1,x=MadModDF$Date,weights=1/MadModDF$N1Error,span=HighSpan,min.weight=MinWeight,method="loess")
MadModDF$pred <- LM22$fitted
G22 <- BasedPlot+
  geom_line(aes(y=pred),color="red",size=PointSize, data=MadModDF)+
  ggtitle("weights=1/N1Error, method=loess")

LM23 <- loessFit(y=MadModDF$N1,x=MadModDF$Date,weights=1/MadModDF$N1Error^2,span=HighSpan,min.weight=MinWeight,method="loess")
MadModDF$pred <- LM23$fitted
G23 <- BasedPlot+
  geom_line(aes(y=pred),color="red",size=PointSize, data=MadModDF)+
  ggtitle("weights=1/N1Error^2, method=loess")

LM31 <- loess(N1~Date,weights=rep(1,dim(MadModDF)[1]),span=HighSpan,data=MadModDF)
MadModDF$pred <- predict(LM31)

G31 <- BasedPlot+
  geom_line(aes(y=pred),color="red",size=PointSize, data=MadModDF)+
  ggtitle("weights=1, method=loess, deg=2")

LM32 <- loess(N1~Date,weights=1/N1Error,span=HighSpan,data=MadModDF)
MadModDF$pred <- predict(LM32)

G32 <- BasedPlot+
```
